SEARCH

Class CreditCard

java.lang.Object
CreditCard
public class CreditCard extends Object
The CreditCard class represents a credit card with attributes such as card number, spending limit, amount spent as well as methods for payments and reward point calculations.

    • calcSpendingLimit

      public double calcSpendingLimit()
      Calculates the credit card's spending limit. Spending limit is 4x the user's income.
      Returns:
      The spending limit.
